result.execSummary:
The defendant John Northrop Jr. was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. John Northrop Jr. is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • John Northrop Jr. was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Final Notice - Total Amount Due on 2/1/16 not paid.

ADDRESS INFO for John Northrop Jr.
Current: 329 Drier St Apt A, Durand, WI 54736 United States  (Effective: 02-17-2016)
Prior: 642 Kent Street, Floresville, TX 78114 United States

Defendant John Northrop in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State informs court restitution paid, looking at fine with costs of @ $250, drop domestic abuse surcharge.  Atty Waters stipulates joint recommendation.  Court advises defendant of elements of count 1/max. penalties.  Defendant pleads no contest on count 1. Plea colloquy. Court finds defendant's waiver of his constitutional rights & plea done knowingly & voluntarily, accepts plea and finds defendant guilty of count 1, dismiss domestic abuse allegation and dismiss count 2; assess costs of $443; TTP $100/mo. com. 2/1/16; complete TTP.  Advised of appeal rights.

Defendant John Northrop in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel received plea offer requests to adjourn to 12/15.  Status conference scheduled for December 15, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant John Northrop in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant pleads NG.  Referred to scheduling clerk.  Any conditions of bond previously set are cont'd.

No possession or consumption of alcohol; 
No other violations of law

Defendant John Northrop in court, in custody.   Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant advised of charges/max. penalties.  Court confirms defendant received copy of criminal complaint.  Court advises defendant of constitutional rights.  No questions by defendant.  State requests $1000 Sign. Bond with cond:  no possess. or consumption of alcohol.  Court sets $1000 signature bond with conditions:  no possession or consumption of alcohol; no other violations of law.  Next date 10/6 @ 1:30.  Court encourages defendant to contact the PD office.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
